text: Prepare the baking tray (sheet) by lining it with kitchen foil.  Remove the stones from the apricots. Aim to keep each apricot whole. Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over the apricots in a bowl. Toss them around a bit to coat them in the cinnamon and sugar. Arrange the coated apricots on the covered tray.  Dab a pat of butter on each apricot. Carefully close up any apricot that is gaping open. Place the apricots under the grill (broiler) for 10 minutes. Turn them over at the 5 minute point. Serve hot with whipped cream.
